text.name: uiBaNe_comingsoon
text.text: This area will get its contents in future updates.

text.name: uiBaNe_tt_helperAbsolute
text.text: The accounted wage is a static value per hour that's defined below.

text.name: uiBaNe_tt_helperPercentile
text.text: The accounted wage is a percentile value of the game's default value.

text.name: uiBaNe_tt_helperWagePercentile
text.text: Paid wage per hour in percent of default value. (!FORMAT: without %-char!)

text.name: uiBaNe_tt_helperConveyorPercentile
text.text: Accounted wage for conveyors in percent. (Def: 125%)

text.name: uiBaNe_tt_helperFieldWorkPercentile
text.text: Accounted wage for conveyors in percent. (Def: 125%)

text.name: uiBaNe_tt_helperFactAval
text.text: Multiplies the wage during set time with this value.

text.name: uiBaNe_tt_helperFactAfrom
text.text: Set multiplier applies from this starting time. (!FORMAT: HH:MM!)

text.name: uiBaNe_tt_helperFactAto
text.text: Set multiplier applies until this ending time. (!FORMAT: HH:MM!)

text.name: uiBaNe_tt_helperFactBval
text.text: Multiplies the wage during set time with this value.

text.name: uiBaNe_tt_helperFactBfrom
text.text: Set multiplier applies from this starting time. (!FORMAT: HH:MM!)

text.name: uiBaNe_tt_helperFactBto
text.text: Set multiplier applies until this ending time. (!FORMAT: HH:MM!)
